scripts.dev:schema:all:drop: npm run dev:schema:wallet:drop && npm run dev:schema:data:drop
scripts.dev:schema:migrate: npm run dev:schema:wallet:migrate && npm run dev:schema:app:migrate
scripts.dev:schema:wallet:migrate: MYSQL_DATABASE=agency_wallets MYSQL_USER=root MYSQL_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 npm run schema-wallet:migrate
scripts.dev:schema:app:migrate: MYSQL_DATABASE=agency_application MYSQL_USER=root MYSQL_PASSWORD=mysecretpassword MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 npm run schema-data:migrate
